name: United World Rolling
overview:
United World Rolling is a social network established to reignite the growth of the extreme rollerblading population, redefine our industry and to create a high quality skate designed to be more like a shoe than any other in existence.

United World Rolling is the first online social community built by rollerbladers to unite rollerbladers around the world regardless of language barriers.

No matter where you’re from you love rolling.. chat, share event info, pics & video, no matter your age or how good you skate.

Site Features include: -Chat translation to the member’s native language +examples include: Arabic, Aramaic, Chinese, Hindi, Spanish, Portuguese

-Profile page translation
-voice messaging
-video chat
-enabling drawing & sending pics while chatting
-spot locator with world map and photos enabled.
    +this details places to skate around the world
-photo & video sharing (which no other rollerblading site allows).

United World Rolling’s mobile App for Android and iPhone is currently in the approval process of both the Android Market and the iTunes App store
